mods.note: This piece of sheet music is included in a bound volume that once belonged to Tennessee resident, Miss Nora Gardner. The cover of this piece has a dedication to "Charles H. Foxwell, Esq." and is entitled "The Signal Set Brilliant Variations." An inscription written in pencil in the upper right corner of the cover reads "Nora Gardner Sept 16th/61."
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.

titleInfo.title: Digital Collection: The Growth of Democracy in Tennessee: A Grassroots Approach to Volunteer Voices
